title: Northridge 1+1 | Central AC | Plank Floors | Parking | Fitness Center
map_address: Merridy Court near White Oak Ave
posting_body: ['Welcome to Merridy Court', 'Welcome to the finest in apartment living at Merridy Court.', 'Our prime location in Northridge places you just minutes away from CSUN, Northridge Fashion Center, and a plentiful variety of restaurants.', 'Our one and two bedroom apartments have hardwood inspired flooring, central air conditioning, gas stoves, and so much more!', 'Meet your fitness goals in our state of the art fitness center.', 'Take a dip in our shimmering swimming pool, or entertain some friends with a BBQ in our picnic area.', 'Enjoy the convenience and comforts of apartment living here at Merridy Court.', 'Apartment Amenities:', 'Gas Range', 'Central Air', 'Microwave*', 'Dishwasher', 'Disability Access', 'Wood Inspired Flooring', 'Refrigerator*', 'Disposal', 'Quartz Or Formica Counter Tops', 'Community Amenities:', 'Picnic Area with Barbecue', 'Close To CSUN', 'State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', 'Laundry Facility', 'Controlled Access/Gated', 'Shimmering Swimming Pool', 'On-Call Maintenance', 'Gated Covered Parking', 'Easy Access to Shopping', 'Elevator', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats - Allowed', 'Images may not be of actual available apartment home.', 'Fixtures and materials used in each apartment may vary.', 'Call for specific details regarding any available apartment home.']
